    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;

}

}

    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;

    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;

    font-size: 14px;

	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;

}

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Goa Weekend Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/goa-tour-packages" title="Goa Tour Packages">Goa</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Goa Weekend Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c30612daf50_02168109" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/goa-weekend.jpg" alt="Goa Weekend Tour Package" title="Goa Weekend Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Goa is known as the beach state of India, which is home to a vibrant nightlife and a quirky culture. Namaste India Trip brings you the perfect opportunity to spend your getaway time on the serene sandy beaches among the peaceful rhythmic sound of the crashing waves. With the Goa weekend trip package, for 4 days and 3 nights you will be completely immersed in the lively atmosphere of this wonderful beach town.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Goa Weekend Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Pune – Goa</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Pune will be the starting point for your Goa trip which will take 9 hours of overnight journey in the Volvo bus.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Arrival in Goa – Sightseeing of North Goa (Old Goa)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Upon arriving at Goa, early in the morning, you will be transferred straight away to your allotted hotel where you will be served some refreshing breakfast, before proceeding for a wholesome sightseeing tour of Northern Goa city.</p>
<p>This sightseeing will kick start with a visit to Mapusa city, which is a fairly unexplored region of Goa and is known for being the commercial hub of the state. You will be welcomed with teeming market places offering some of the most fragrant and aromatic eatables and spices which is a must buy. Places that you will be made to visit in this part of the city will be the spiritual centers of St. Jerome Church a 400-year-old holy center and an 1843 Hanuman temple with Lord Hanuman as the presiding deity.</p>
<p>You will then be taken to the serene Vagator beach, which is a clean and quiet place and is lined with eating spots offering delicious seafood and locally prepared delicacies.</p>
<p>After spending some time soaking in the sun you will be taken to the site from where you will be able to witness the grandness of the unending Arabian Sea. Built-in 1612 this fort still stands tall and mighty while attracting throngs of tourists every day.</p>
<p>Timings: 9:30 am to 6 pm</p>
<p>Entry Fees: free entry for all</p>
<p><strong>Pro Tip:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Make sure you plan your visit keeping in mind the on seasons which lasts from October to May.</li>
<li>Do not litter anywhere you go and help in keeping the pristine standard of the place intact.</li>
<li>After a day packed with fun and relaxation you will be made to head back to your hotel.</li>
</ul></div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>South Goa Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post breakfast you will be taken for a sightseeing tour of the southern part of Goa, the quieter and calmer region. The entire region is lined with peaceful beaches beautiful churches and quirky marketplaces.</p>
<p>You will be taken to white, sandy, and tranquil beaches like Dona Paula, Miramar, and Colva, where you can leave the stress behind and just listen to the crashing of the blue waves.</p>
<p>Later you will be taken to some of the most spiritual centers in South Goa like, Basilica of Bom Jesus, a UNESCO world heritage site that houses the body of St. Xavier and is considered to be extremely highly revered by Christians.</p>
<p>You will then be taken to Shri Mangeshi temple; one of the most frequently visited temples in Goa. It is also a heritage site where the presiding deity is Lord Mangeshi, an incarnation of Lord Shiva.</p>
<p><strong>Timings:</strong> 6 am to 10 pm</p>
<p><strong>Entry Fees:</strong> free entry for all</p>
<p>Finally, your day will end with you being taken back to your hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Goa Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Finally, your day will conclude after a relaxing time in Goa. You will be escorted to the Volvo bus stand from where you will head on to your desired destination.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Goa Weekend Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Months Are Not Ideal For A Trip To Goa?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> March to May: This is the season when the temperature rises, the sea becomes rougher, and the weather becomes hot and humid. There aren't many people who visit Goa between March and May because there aren't many things to do.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Season Is Best For Goa?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Winter is the best time to visit Goa because of the pleasant weather. Due to the pleasant weather that begins the high season, tourists begin to pour in.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Part Of Goa Is Best?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Calangute, Baga, Anjuna, Vagator, Morjim, Mandrem, and Ashvem are the best places to visit. South Goa is a more relaxed and luxurious area with cleaner and quieter beaches. Agonda, Palolem, Patnem, Benaulim, Colva, Cavelossim, and Arrosim are the best places to stay.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Beach In Goa Is The Cleanest?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Galgibaga. What is it? One of India's cleanest beaches, it also serves as a nesting site for olive Ridley sea turtles.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is The Most Well-Known Dish In Goa?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Some of Goa's most famous culinary specialties include Goan Fish Curry, Shark Ambot Tik, Chicken Xacuti, Goan Pork Vindaloo, Sorpotel, Feijoada, Chicken Cafreal, Sorak, Samarachi Kodi, Goan Khatkhate, and Sannas.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Goa Weekend Tour Package Home » India » Goa » Goa Weekend Tour Package Tour Overview Goa is known as the beach state of India, which is home to a vibrant nightlife and a quirky culture. Namaste India Trip brings you the perfect opportunity to spend your getaway time on the serene sandy beaches among...
